typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as string,
		ReleaseDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> DwhRating
DwhRating aggregate(groupBy(Rating),
	RatingX = count(Rating)) ~> Aggregate1
